metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40633 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: A memory leak (out-of-memory) in gif2rgb in util/gif2rgb.c in giflib 5.1.4 allows remote attackers trigger an out of memory exception or denial of service via a gif format file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix available from the upstream developers as of 2023-09-15

criterions.comment: giflib package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-09-15').
